modShortDescription: Changed the 20 health to 20% stamina regen. Also added another tier that adds 20% reload and sprint speed.
modDescription:
AnsontheToad and friends had an issue with the [perk](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-perks/) using up all their food because of the health bump and healing, so he changed the 20 health to 20% stamina regen. Also added another tier that adds 20% reload and sprint speed.

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1z8UFhk1lwfbrsLd0uDZzLi-LK0bk7qng)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/20895-toads-modlets/).

**Credits:** [AnsontheToad](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/ansonthetoad/)
